resources.string:
Receive Android notifications in your browser. 
Instead of checking notifications directly on your phone, you can check them on your desktop while surfing the web. 

1.Get started by Singing up.

2.Install Notify! the companion browser extensions.
Enable Notify! in the settings and return to the setup.

Pair your computer by installing chrome companion browser extension. 
 1.Search GetNotify! in chrome extesnion.
 2.Login with Username and OTP.
 3.Thats all once your phone get notification by SMS or Call will post notification to chrome.
